title: Lolth-Sworn Drow

Lolth-Sworn Drow

Base Racial Speed Drow Weapon Training Fey Ancestry Superior Darkvision

Lolth-Sworn Drow is a Subrace of Drow in Baldur's Gate 3. Lolth-Sworn Drow have +1 Charisma and +2 Dexterity. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of races. Each of them has their special characteristics and some of them have Sub
